import useState from 'react' import PageTitle from '../utils/titles/PageTitle' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' const ArtistRegister = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', passwordCheck: '', }) const { email, password, passwordCheck } = formData return (
Vous inscrire en tant qu'artiste
Adresse email Mot de passe Mot de passe (confirmation)
) } export default ArtistRegister
